description: Set the value of wall attributes. This command is a synonym for the wall initialize command. Individual attributes can be listed with the wall list command and all attributes can be visualized. The optional vertex keyword can be used with the velocity keywords to set the vertex velocities for vertices in the specified range. The optional facet keyword can be used with the conveyor velocity keywords to set the facet conveyor velocities for facets in the specified range. Note: Be aware of the distinction between attributes and properties! The tutorial example 'Attributes and Properties' discusses this issue in detail.

keywords.name: cutoff-angle
keywords.description: Set the cutoff angle (in degrees) for walls. Default: 0. Controls contact state information propagation

keywords.name: displacement
keywords.description: Accumulated wall displacement vector as a result of cycling

keywords.name: displacement-x
keywords.description: X-component of accumulated wall displacement as a result of cycling

keywords.name: displacement-y
keywords.description: Y-component of accumulated wall displacement as a result of cycling

keywords.name: displacement-z
keywords.description: Z-component of accumulated wall displacement as a result of cycling (3D ONLY)

keywords.name: euler
keywords.description: Current orientation of Euler angles following X,Y,Z convention in degrees (3D ONLY). Updated only when orientation tracking is enabled

keywords.name: euler-x
keywords.description: X-euler angle (in degrees) of current wall orientation (3D ONLY)

keywords.name: euler-y
keywords.description: Y-euler angle (in degrees) of current wall orientation (3D ONLY)

keywords.name: euler-z
keywords.description: Z-euler angle (in degrees) of current wall orientation (3D ONLY)

keywords.name: fragment
keywords.description: Fragment ID (see Fragment documentation)

keywords.name: position
keywords.description: Wall location vector (average position of all vertices). Center of rotation is not modified

keywords.name: position-x
keywords.description: X-component of wall location (average position of all vertices). Center of rotation is not modified

keywords.name: position-y
keywords.description: Y-component of wall location (average position of all vertices). Center of rotation is not modified

keywords.name: position-z
keywords.description: Z-component of wall location (average position of all vertices). Center of rotation is not modified

keywords.name: rotation-center
keywords.description: Center of rotation for walls. Position about which rotations occur when angular velocity is supplied. Default: origin

keywords.name: rotation-center-x
keywords.description: X-component of center of rotation. Default: origin

keywords.name: rotation-center-y
keywords.description: Y-component of center of rotation. Default: origin

keywords.name: rotation-center-z
keywords.description: Z-component of center of rotation (3D ONLY). Default: origin

keywords.name: spin
keywords.description: Wall angular velocity in radians per second. Walls rotate around their center of rotation (y- and z-components 3D ONLY)

keywords.name: spin-x
keywords.description: X-component of wall angular velocity in radians per second (3D ONLY)

keywords.name: spin-y
keywords.description: Y-component of wall angular velocity in radians per second (3D ONLY)

keywords.name: spin-z
keywords.description: Z-component of wall angular velocity in radians per second (3D ONLY)

keywords.name: velocity
keywords.description: Wall translational velocity vector. With 'vertex' keyword, sets vertex velocity (range applies to vertices)

keywords.name: velocity-x
keywords.description: X-component of wall translational velocity. With 'vertex' keyword, sets vertex velocity (range applies to vertices)

keywords.name: velocity-y
keywords.description: Y-component of wall translational velocity. With 'vertex' keyword, sets vertex velocity (range applies to vertices)

keywords.name: velocity-z
keywords.description: Z-component of wall translational velocity (3D ONLY). With 'vertex' keyword, sets vertex velocity (range applies to vertices)

keywords.name: velocity-conveyor
keywords.description: Facet conveyor velocity vector. Fictitious velocity added to wall velocity for relative velocity calculation. Cannot be active with vertex velocities

keywords.name: velocity-conveyor-x
keywords.description: X-component of facet conveyor velocity. Cannot be active with vertex velocities

keywords.name: velocity-conveyor-y
keywords.description: Y-component of facet conveyor velocity. Cannot be active with vertex velocities

keywords.name: velocity-conveyor-z
keywords.description: Z-component of facet conveyor velocity (3D ONLY). Cannot be active with vertex velocities

modifiers.name: add
modifiers.description: Add f to the existing value

modifiers.name: gradient
modifiers.description: Apply a linear gradient in each of the axes directions starting at the origin

modifiers.name: gradient-x
modifiers.description: Apply a linear gradient in the x-direction starting at the origin

modifiers.name: gradient-y
modifiers.description: Apply a linear gradient in the y-direction starting at the origin

modifiers.name: gradient-z
modifiers.description: Apply a linear gradient in the z-direction starting at the origin (3D ONLY)

modifiers.name: multiply
modifiers.description: Multiply the existing value by f

modifiers.name: replace
modifiers.description: Replace the existing value with f

examples.description: Set the z-component of velocity for the wall named platenBottom

examples.command: wall attribute velocity-z 0.0 range id 100 by wall
examples.description: Set the z-component of velocity for the wall with ID 100
Set the center of rotation for walls in group wallassembly
Set wall translational velocity vector for wall ID 1
Set angular velocity (spinning around z-axis) for wall named rotating_drum

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: Wall.set_*() methods (e.g., Wall.set_vel(), Wall.set_spin(), Wall.set_pos(), Wall.set_disp(), Wall.set_rotation_center()) - requires iteration over wall range
